SEARCH
Package Models

Class Medication

java.lang.Object
Models.Medication
public class Medication extends Object
The Medication class represents a medicine item in a pharmacy or healthcare setting. It contains details about the medicine's name, stock quantity, and low stock alert threshold. This class provides functionality for managing the stock, checking stock levels, prescribing, replenishing stock, and converting the information to a CSV string for export.
Since:
2024-11-21
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Medication

      public Medication(String medicineName, int stock, int lowStockAlert)
      Constructs a new Medication object with the specified name, initial stock level, and low stock alert threshold.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      stock - The initial stock level of the medicine.
      lowStockAlert - The stock threshold that triggers a low stock alert.

  • Method Details

    • isLowStock

      public boolean isLowStock()
      Checks if the current stock of the medicine is below or equal to the low stock threshold.
      Returns:
      true if the stock is low or equal to the low stock threshold, otherwise false.

    • prescribe

      public boolean prescribe(int quantity)
      Prescribes a specified quantity of the medicine. If the quantity is available in stock, it is deducted from the current stock.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine to prescribe.
      Returns:
      true if the prescription was successful (i.e., enough stock is available), false otherwise (if the requested quantity exceeds available stock).

    • replenish

      public void replenish(int quantity)
      Replenishes the stock of the medicine by a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity to add to the stock.

    • toCSVString

      public String toCSVString()
      Converts the details of this Medication to a CSV-formatted string. The format will be: "medicineName, stock, lowStockThreshold".
      Returns:
      A CSV-formatted string representing the medication details.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this Medication in a human-readable format. If the stock is below or equal to the low stock threshold, the string includes a "LOW STOCK!" message.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the medication details.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The name of the medicine.

    • getCurrentStock

      public int getCurrentStock()
      Gets the current stock level of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The current stock of the medicine.

    • getLowStockThreshold

      public int getLowStockThreshold()
      Gets the low stock threshold for this medicine.
      Returns:
      The low stock threshold.

    • setCurrentStock

      public void setCurrentStock(int stock)
      Sets the current stock level of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      stock - The new stock level.

    • setLowStockThreshold

      public void setLowStockThreshold(int threshold)
      Sets the low stock threshold for this medicine.
      Parameters:
      threshold - The new low stock threshold.
